ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads

Class SensorData

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.threads.SensorData

  • public class SensorData
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements methods to manage data from our sensors
    Author:
    Caspar Cedro, Percy Chen, Patrick Erath, Anssam Ghezala, Susan Matuszewski, Kamy Moussavi Kafi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double getA()
      (deprecated, not using) This method returns the currently stored angle value from the gyro sensor
      double getD()
      Return the ultraSonic distance data.
      double[] getL()
      get the light value data from the two light sensors (protected by lightLock)
      int[] getRGB()
      get the rgb data for light sensor (protected by rgb lock)
      static SensorData getSensorData()
      OdometerData factory.
      void setA(double a)
      (deprecated not usings) This method overwrites the angle value.
      void setD(double d)
      This method overwrites the distance value.
      void setL(double[] l)
      This method overwrites the light value.
      void setRGB(int r, int g, int b)
      set rgb data for color sensor (protected by rgb lock)

    • Method Detail

      • getSensorData

        public static SensorData getSensorData()
                                throws OdometerExceptions
        OdometerData factory. Returns an OdometerData instance and makes sure that only one instance is ever created. If the user tries to instantiate multiple objects, the method throws a MultipleOdometerDataException.
        Returns:
        An OdometerData object
        Throws:
        OdometerExceptions

      • getD

        public double getD()
        Return the ultraSonic distance data.
        Returns:
        the sensor data.

      • getL

        public double[] getL()
        get the light value data from the two light sensors (protected by lightLock)

      • getRGB

        public int[] getRGB()
        get the rgb data for light sensor (protected by rgb lock)

      • getA

        public double getA()
        (deprecated, not using) This method returns the currently stored angle value from the gyro sensor
        Returns:
        The current angle value

      • setD

        public void setD(double d)
        This method overwrites the distance value. Use for ultrasonic sensor.
        Parameters:
        d - The value to overwrite distance with

      • setA

        public void setA(double a)
        (deprecated not usings) This method overwrites the angle value.
        Parameters:
        a - The value to overwrite angle with

      • setRGB

        public void setRGB(int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        set rgb data for color sensor (protected by rgb lock)
        Parameters:
        r: - red value
        g: - green value
        b: - blue value

      • setL

        public void setL(double[] l)
        This method overwrites the light value. (protected by light lock)
        Parameters:
        l - The value to overwrite the current light value with
